This reading is intended to help one understand a dream's message or meaning. The cards should be placed such that they create an outward clockwise spiral and should be more circular that the above diagram appears
Choose a card the represents the dream situation or your feelings about the dream
Tells something about the dream's events, such as when where, how, and why
What the dream means to you in 'walking life'
What the dream means to you on an inner psychic level
When energy is needed to cause the dream to manifest physically, if you desire, or to solve the dream's dilemma
How the dream will manifest and its effects
